name: Hunter: Avendzer Dragon
storyline: Young hero Emeralda is stopped by mysterious Ruby knight that prevents her from coming back home, until she defeats legendary Avendzer Dragon - master of Air element. Emeralda is the chosen one and it is her fate to do so. World is full of dinosours and dragons and humanity lives in just one village in this world.
summary: RPG Maker Game made by Kitabake
